title: Trailer of a Film That Will Never Exist: Phony Wars
original_title: Film annonce du film qui n’existera jamais : « Drôles de guerres »
overview: Rejecting the billions of alphabetic diktats to liberate the incessant metamorphoses and metaphors of a necessary and true language by re-turning to the locations of past film shoots, while keeping track of modern times.
synopsis: Rejecting the billions of alphabetic diktats to liberate the incessant metamorphoses and metaphors of a necessary and true language by re-turning to the locations of past film shoots, while keeping track of modern times.
